articles.description: Reaction as 16-year-old Rio Ngumoha scores fairytale debut winner for Liverpool to seal 3-2 win against Newcastle at St James' Park.
articles.title: Premier League reaction: Ngumoha scores fairytale debut winner for Liverpool

articles.description: Newcastle United managed to score two goals against Liverpool, but the black-and-whites need a resolution to the Alexander Isak saga.
articles.title: Newcastle: Pride, passion & heartbreak - but end to Alexander Isak saga needed

articles.description: Manager Arne Slot says "he is not too sure he saw a football match" as he questioned Newcastle's tactics during Liverpool's 3-2 win at St James' Park.
articles.title: Liverpool: Arne Slot on Newcastle tactics in his side's 3-2 win

articles.description: Valtteri Bottas and Sergio Perez will return to the Formula 1 grid in 2026, driving for the new Cadillac team.
articles.title: Cadillac: Valtteri Bottas and Sergio Perez to drive for new F1 team in 2026

articles.description: Few people gave Venus Williams a chance on her US Open return - so a gallant defeat felt like victory for the 45-year-old after her debilitating health issues.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Venus Williams impresses in New York defeat by Karolina Muchova

articles.description: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.
articles.title: Heather Fisher: World Cup winner on hair loss, identity & resilience

articles.description: Crystal Palace make an approach to sign Manchester City defender Manuel Akanji, who is valued at about £15m.
articles.title: Manuel Akanji: Crystal Palace make approach for Man City defender

articles.description: Sixteen-year-old Rio Ngumoha scores the winning goal for Liverpool against Newcastle in the Premier League, but who is he?
articles.title: Newcastle 2-3 Liverpool: Who is Rio Ngumoha?

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Timber, Pickford, Fernandez, Guimaraes, Gyokeres, Grealish

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz marks his US Open progress with a golf swing celebration in honour of watching Masters champion Rory McIlroy.
articles.title: US Open 2025 results: Carlos Alcaraz pays tribute to Rory McIlroy, while Coleman Wong makes history
